job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Iris's client, a large Banking / Financial organization, is currently searching for a strong &lt; Data Scientist &gt; for a &lt;contract &gt; to join their team.Our client has offices all over the world and has the global reach, advisory services and distribution power to meet the needs of issuers and investors worldwide.      Position:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Data ScientistLocation:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Irving, TX / Jersey City, NJ, MississaugaDuration:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Long TermRequired Skill:     - Ability to run the query   
  - Ability to analyze data in excel as well as through Python – dealing with large scale (5-10M+) data set   
  - Ability to understand, collect and analyze large scale system error logs, system logs, running processes (process parameters)   
  - Ability to understand, collect and analyze financial data and figure out missing transactional components (intelligent search) – work closely with BAs with financial knowledge, learn the business, and perform analysis   
  - Suggest corrective actions based on AI/ML models (Automation)   
  - Ability to use various ML modeling techniques (for ML engineers)   
  - Have used ML for Data quality, controls, and automation   
  - &nbsp;Please focus on quality and share good profiles irrespective of the rates
